name: TKBERTLVRecord
desc: An object that parses BER-encoded data and produces DER-encoded data for TLV records.

items.name: init(tag: TKTLVTag, value: Data)
items.desc: Initializes a BER-TLV record with the specified tag and value.

items.name: init(tag: TKTLVTag, records: [TKTLVRecord])
items.desc: Initializes a BER-TLV record with the specified tag and an array of TLV subrecords.

items.name: typealias TKTLVTag
items.desc: The type used to identify TLV format tags.

items.name: class func data(forTag: TKTLVTag) -> Data
items.desc: Encodes a specified tag using BER-TLV tag encoding rules.
